package.name: divvit
package.summary: Divvit presents insights in beautiful dashboards, KPIs and recommendations to boost your shop's performance.
package.description:
Divvit provides advanced tracking and analytics functionality designed for eCommerce merchants. The basic analytics version is free to use forever, while more advanced modules will be charged for on a monthly basis and will help you gain valuable insights into your business to improve your performance.

Divvit's interface is designed specifically for the needs of eCommerce merchants and will be helpful for any type of shop, small or large in any category. You will gain insights in the following four areas:

  • Traffic - Get detailed reports on all your traffic channels and how they are performing
  • Conversion - Fully understand your users journey through your site and what makes them drop out or buy
  • Order attribution - Analyze single orders and customers to find ways to increase loyalty
  • Cost - Connect your marketing sources through our APIs to get full insights into your channels' spend, efficency and ROI

You will get an instant performance overview from the insights dashboard. You can dig through drilldown reports for deeper discoveries and integrate any channels for cost benefit evaluation. Divvit will guide you all the way through and help you to focus your optimizations where needed.

Go to the Divvit features site to get a full overview or sign up to test our demo account
